## The educational program framework

- Cadet centered learning

- Active learning facilitates deeper understanding of the topics

## Learning outcomes

The cadet has knowledge of:  

- the effect of warm up on injury prevention and athletic performance

- the military work demands and link to the military pentathlon

- concurrent training in developing physical capacities

- optimizing performance
